romed-testpilot-ui-api-autotests.title: TestPilot: UI & API autotests
romed-testpilot-ui-api-autotests.description: TestPilot is a pet project dedicated to automated UI and API testing using Cypress. The project will test the Taiga task management platform, including authorization scenarios, working with lists and tables.

romed-mytestcases.title: MyTestCases
romed-mytestcases.description: Test cases that will be automated using cypress
